Title: Relates to the major renewable energy development program; establishes the significant farmland identification program
Summary: Relates to the major renewable energy development program; establishes the significant farmland identification program; establishes the farmland and agricultural preservation fund; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง94-c, Exec L; amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L; add ยง89-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the major renewable energy development program; to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the significant farmland identification program; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the farmland and agricultural preservation fund; and to provide for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
